message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a unique opportunity to get a great deal on a high-quality item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $115. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale. Can you consider $115?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. Can you consider $110? I'm really interested in this product and I'm willing to make a decision soon.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Bob! I'm glad to hear that you're interested in making a decision soon. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment to meet you in the middle, so I'll consider $112.50. This is my best offer, but I'm willing to negotiate further if you're willing to meet me at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, but I'm still a bit away from $112.50. Can you consider $108? I'm getting close to my budget, and I'd like to make a decision soon.

I understand that you're close to your budget, Bob, and I appreciate your honesty. I'm willing to make one more concession to meet you at a price that works for both of us. I'll consider $110. This is my final offer, and I'm confident that you'll find it reasonable.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit away from $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $105. This is my final counteroffer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, and I'm glad we're having a good negotiation. However, I've already made a significant concession, and I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you at $107.50, but I don't think I can go any lower than that. This is my last offer.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $107.50, but I'm still a bit away from my target price. I'm willing to make a final offer of $105, but if you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider buying from John for $150. This is my last offer.
